typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		fruit as string,
		size as string,
		color as string,
		datetime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceMongoExportedFile
SourceMongoExportedFile derive(parKey = fruit+toString('-')+toString(toDate(datetime)),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn4NewPartitionKey
DerivedColumn4NewPartitionKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['NewFileAddedPartitionKeyColumn.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> NoHeaderNewFileAddedPartitionKeyColumn
